response.overview: AmFilm San Diego is proud to release its first two short films as a single digital download. Class Photo: Former Army officer, Sally Hofmeyer, starts her new career in photography taking children's class photos. Sally unwittingly uncovers a government program to indoctrinate the children through mind control. The Letter: Young competitive equestrian rider, Madeline O'Connor, must overcome a tragic car accident, which claims her beloved father and her mobility. This is a touching film inspiring hope.
response.title: Class Photo & The Letter
